name: MrAkyat Dress Up!
description:
Dress up the ultimate Mr.Akyat in this game based on hololive productions' Pavolia Reine illustrations!

Share your creations on Twitter with the tag #MERAKyatsDressUp

Source Stream: How to Play

The current version of the game exports the result into a transparent 900x900 pixel PNG that will open in a new browser tab. Just press the camera button on the bottom right. If you have a pop-up blocker it may not show up.

The buttons on the top right can be used to move objects on top or behind each other. You can't move objects behind Mr. Akyat.

Most of the objects snap in place near the head, upper body, lower body or feet. However, you can turn snapping off by pressing the button near the bottom right.

Disclaimer

Other Information

I may work on a more feature rich version of this dress up game in the future.
